column1:
2 out of 5 stars.
VOICE COMMAND DOES NOT WORK
10 MONTHS AGO
I bought this TV a month ago and since then the voice commands are not working and LG customer service told me that the software only understand Korean English. Its a waste if you are some one who use voice command frequently. The picture quality is super but the whole experience goes for toss because of the voice command issues
How long have you owned this product?A few weeks
What is your primary reason for choosing LG?Recommendation
Was this an in-store or online purchase?In-store

2 out of 5 stars.
WORST TV
A YEAR AGO
I request to all do not buy LG OLED TV particularly LG C3 model.I bought LG C3 48 OLED tv and within 2 weeks I saw horizontal lines throught the display and black line at the bottom. I raised a complaint before 3 weeks but I didn't receive the replacement yet.
How long have you owned this product?A few weeks
What is your primary reason for choosing LG?Online Research
Was this an in-store or online purchase?Online
No, I do not recommend this product.

5 out of 5 stars.
FEATURE RICH!
8 MONTHS AGO
C3 provides a fantastic viewing experience in an OLED, the HDR and Dolby Vision capabilities of the TV is truely amazing. I bought the TV a days ago, went with the 55 inch model. Confused b/w S90C and C3, but the reliable service and 3 year warranty is a game changer.
